title: Swap $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: Replace f(x) with $$y$$ and swap $$x$$ and $$y$$ in the equation.

title: Isolate the squared term
text: Move terms around so that $$x^2$$ is by itself.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: Take the square root of both sides, making sure to keep the correct domain restriction in mind.
